## DefaultCredentialManager class

The default implementation for the CredentialManager interface.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DefaultCredentialManager implements CredentialManager 
```
**Implements:** [CredentialManager](./foundation-comms.credentialmanager.md)
